question: Shipping Ministry inaugurated ‘Direct Port Entry Facility’ at which major port?
explanation:
Union Minister of State for Shipping Mansukh Mandaviya inaugurated the ‘Direct Port Entry (DPE) facility’ of V.O. Chidambaranar Port Trust, Tamil Nadu.
‘Direct Port Entry (DPE)’ will help in increasing Ease of Doing Business for the exporters. The facility is expected to lower tariff cost and improve the competitiveness of shipper in the international trade. This will also align it on the lines of ‘Maritime Vision 2030’ of Ministry of Shipping.
